org.jcrom

Interface SessionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionFactoryImpl

    public interface SessionFactory
    Session Factory interface. This interface describes a simplfied contract for retrieving a session.
    Author:
    Nicolas Dos Santos

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.jcr.Session getSession()
      Returns a Session using the credentials and workspace on this SessionFactory implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        javax.jcr.Session getSession()
                      throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Returns a Session using the credentials and workspace on this SessionFactory implementation. The session factory doesn't allow specification of a different workspace name because:

        " Each Session object is associated one-to-one with a Workspace object. The Workspace object represents a `view` of an actual repository workspace entity as seen through the authorization settings of its associated Session." (quote from javax.jcr.Session javadoc).

        Returns:
        the session.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
